import{makeStyles}from'@material-ui/core/styles';const useStyles=makeStyles(theme=>({container:{display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',alignItems:'center',height:'100vh',maxWidth:'100vw',padding:'20px',background:'linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(96,99,110,1) 5%, rgba(163,129,214,1) 46%, rgba(8,110,194,1) 98%)'},paper:{marginTop:theme.spacing(23),display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',alignItems:'center',padding:'20px',background:'#eeeeee76',maxWidth:'500px'},form:{width:'100%',// Fix IE 11 issue.
marginTop:theme.spacing(2)},submit:{margin:theme.spacing(3,0,2)}}));export default useStyles;
